E8A254024E808ABACD1092A59D2F76CB: Fiery canines evolved from the Wyldness, their powerful claws are prized for use in crafting. Drawn to the heat of the sun, these creatures can often be found during the day.
56D4BA9447D33D393B382588CAC446E4: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the ELEMENTS locked within.
